text:
I believe the restart notification part is standard. If you install 10 updates, the first one that requires a restart will trigger that even though there may be 9 more behind it that may also require one. You just have to ignore it until they all finish. -- There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
 those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ %40ATLEXCH03.byers.local

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Windows 10 WU - three reboots
